content: *find the free pattern to view on the blog through the link here on ravelry * there is also a printable ad-free version available in my etsy shop enjoy with it s knit look and braid like stitches this cuddler blanket is both timeless and right on trend using a large hook and super bulky yarn you ll be cozy both making and using your squishy new blanket one day is all you ll need to whip it up and it s easy enough for beginners this blanket is made with basic crochet stitches you can easily customize the size by starting with a longer or shorter chain any stitch count will do and crocheting for more or fewer row keep yarn needs in mind if you adjust the size hope you like it
